positions.description: Main entrance of the Airport, suitable for vehicle or character entry.
Check-in counter area, ideal for dialogue or transaction scenes.
Security checkpoint, suitable for tense or investigative scenes.
Runway observation deck, offering a strategic vantage point.
Parking lot adjacent to the Airport, suitable for vehicle parking or ambush scenes.

paths.description: A straight path from the main entrance to the check-in counter area.
A narrow path leading from the check-in counter to the security checkpoint.
A staircase connecting the security checkpoint to the observation deck.
A ramp leading from the observation deck to the parking lot.
A curved path from the main entrance to the parking lot.

obstacles.description: A security metal detector blocking the path to the checkpoint, requiring characters to pass through.
A damaged staircase leading to the observation deck, requiring careful navigation.
An abandoned luggage cart blocking the ramp to the parking lot.
A temporary construction barrier partially blocking the curved path to the parking lot.
